name: Late Summer Soup
description:
you are movign into your new bullion valley apartment!!!! what secrets will you find there?

========

made for magical girl game jam 7!!!!

you become a magical girl. but i didn't want to cut right to it!! i wanted the game to be JUST that part.

... but i only have day 1 polished, and day 2 partially complete. the transformation happens during day 3. 

i WILL finish this project ;__;

***note for slow computers***

set your PC resolution pretty low then load the d3d12 shortcut and set the render scale even lower like 0.5.. sry i should optimize it better ;__;

apologies for linux and mac users it crashes my uunity when i try to set it to taht in the build settings ;______________; whyyyyyy i hope i can fix this.
